abstract: It would be impossible to build one computer to please everyone, but Toshiba’s new Satellite A205-S4617 notebook sure takes a whack at it.
snippet: It would be impossible to build one computer to please everyone, but Toshiba’s new Satellite A205-S4617 notebook sure takes a whack at it.
lead_paragraph: It would be impossible to build one computer to please everyone, but Toshiba’s new Satellite A205-S4617 notebook sure takes a whack at it. It is powered by an Intel Core 2 Duo processor running at 1.66 gigahertz and has 2 gigabytes of RAM, which is what you need to run all the features of Windows Vista’s Home Premium edition.

headline.main: Not Light, but Worth a Look for Those Who Like Sleek, Loaded Notebook Computers
headline.print_headline: Not Light, but Worth a Look For Those Who Like Sleek, Loaded Notebook Computers
